bdi4jade.belief

Interface Belief<K,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - the type of the belief name or key.
    V - the type of the belief value.
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, jade.content.Concept, jade.content.ContentElement, MetadataElement, java.io.Serializable, jade.content.Term
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BeliefSet<K,V>, Predicate<K>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBelief, AbstractBeliefSet, DerivedBelief, DerivedPredicate, PersistentBelief, SoftgoalPreferences, TransientBelief, TransientBeliefSet, TransientPredicate

    public interface Belief<K,V>
extends java.io.Serializable, jade.content.Concept, jade.content.ContentElement, MetadataElement, java.lang.Cloneable
    This interface represents a belief of the belief base. It has a name (or a key) and a value associate with it. It is parameterized by the types of the name/key and value. For example, a name may be an object representing a propositional formula, and the value is a boolean indicating whether the formula is true or false. It extends the MetadataElement interface, allowing to associate metadata with beliefs.
    Author:
    Ingrid Nunes

    • Method Detail

      • addBeliefBase

        void addBeliefBase(BeliefBase beliefBase)
        Adds a belief base that contains this belief. The agent whose capability contains this belief in the belief base believes in this belief.
        Parameters:
        beliefBase - the belief base to be added.

      • clone

        java.lang.Object clone()
                throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
        Clones a belief. This may be particularly useful to share this belief with other agents, copying the information of this belief without sharing other information, such as belief bases associated with a belief.
        Returns:
        the clone of this belief.
        Throws:
        java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException - if an implementation of a belief does not support clone.

      • getBeliefBases

        java.util.Set<BeliefBase> getBeliefBases()
        Returns the belief bases with which this belief is associated.
        Returns:
        the belief bases.

      • getName

        K getName()
        Returns the name of this belief.
        Returns:
        the string that is the belief name.

      • getValue

        V getValue()
        Gets the current value of the belief.
        Returns:
        the belief value.

      • removeBeliefBase

        void removeBeliefBase(BeliefBase beliefBase)
        Removes a belief base that does not contain this belief anymore. The agent whose capability does not contain this belief in the belief base does not believe in this belief anymore.
        Parameters:
        beliefBase - the belief base to be removed.

      • setValue

        void setValue(V value)
        Sets the new value of the belief.
        Parameters:
        value - the new value.
